alarm.description: Can be an AlarmName or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) from an existing alarm.

extensionPeriod.description: The maximum time in seconds that the composite alarm waits after suppressor alarm goes out of the `ALARM` state. After this time, the composite alarm performs its actions.

waitPeriod.description: The maximum time in seconds that the composite alarm waits for the suppressor alarm to go into the `ALARM` state. After this time, the composite alarm performs its actions.
